articles.author: Graham Readfearn
articles.title: Melting Antarctic ice predicted to cause rapid slowdown of deep ocean current by 2050 - The Guardian
articles.description: New research by Australian scientists suggests 40% slowdown in just three decades could alter world’s climate for centuries
articles.content: Melting ice around Antarctica will cause a rapid slowdown of a major global deep ocean current by 2050 that could alter the worlds climate for centuries and accelerate sea level rise, according to sc… [+5846 chars]
